ads.main_text2: The commmunications protocol for Web3, BitBoy Crypto brings the ecosystem together by enabling wallets and apps to securely connect and interact.
ads.webview: Words separated by a single space
ads.dialog_desc: Restore an existing Wallet with your 12 or 24 nmemonic words or your private key.
